name: Cross The Burning Fire
description:
he most addictive Lets Cross the Hell 2016 game which will make you spend hours trying to get the little frogy to cross hell river!
Will you be able to pass all the levels?,
Move frogy to cross the hell laid out before him. Cross fire rivers, bucket trails and more!
Control your character with taps and swipes to advance through the level while avoiding hazards.

Features
• Tap to move forward
• Swipe up, down, left and right to move in those directions.
• 3D Graphics
• Real time animations
• Easy to play, hard to master game
